title: Spanish Tapas: Snacks That Built a Culture
description: A micro-lesson that makes Spanish Tapas: Snacks That Built a Culture usable.

hook.text: Legend says King Alfonso X ordered taverns to serve food with wine to prevent drunkenness. Tapas were born.
